data.text: “Ningĩ ambĩrĩria macakaya19:1 Icakaya rĩĩrĩ rĩatungagwo na rĩkainwo hĩndĩ ya mathiko ma mũtongoria (2Sam 1:17-27). makoniĩ athamaki a Isiraeli,
“ ‘Na rĩrĩa nyina ya mũrũũthi ũcio yoonire mwĩhoko wayo ndũnahinga,
Naguo ũgĩcangacanga gatagatĩ ka mĩrũũthi ĩrĩa ĩngĩ,
Makĩũguucũrũria na icũhĩ cia maniũrũ, makĩũingĩria kĩaga-ini,
No nĩwamunyirwo na mĩri yaguo nĩ ũndũ wa marakara,
Na rĩrĩ, rĩu ũhaandĩtwo werũ-inĩ wa mũthanga,
Mwaki woimire rũhonge-inĩ rũmwe rwa iria nene,
